title: Don't you hate it when the enemy being an idiot actually gets you killed?
body: I go into a bush, stealth in there. About 20 seconds later, long enough for me to be LONG gone, LB comes up top and starts spamming her w and in the bush. I can't do anything because she's 3 levels higher than me and fed like mad. I ping for TF to come help me, since she's his lane, and he activates his ult LONG before he's close enough to teleport up there. I end up dying >>
